sentences.english: Connect this part to the machine.

sentences.english: Thus parts sequences of subassemblies can be automatically planned.
sentences.chinese: 由此，完成子裝配體內零件的自動順序規劃。

sentences.english: The authors have designed the casting process of the housing part from a factory.
sentences.chinese: 並結合工廠管卡零件進行了鑄造工藝輔助設計。

sentences.english: We can conform the levelness of the machine by means of shim and screw jack.
sentences.chinese: 我們可能利用墊鐵和螺絲千斤頂來調零件器的水平度。

sentences.chinese: 用我們的機器人零件清單也會幫助你開始。

sentences.english: As a result, it can decrease production routine and reduce production costs, which will lay foundations for practical research on parts such as crank axle.
sentences.chinese: 本研究爲曲軸等非調質鋼零件的實用性研究提供參考。

sentences.english: This process are also suitable for the deeply hardening of large-scale plate-type wor…
sentences.chinese: 也適於大型盤狀零件外圓面的深層硬化。

sentences.english: Make? C designs that allow easy, cost-effective disassembly and re-use of parts at end of life.
sentences.chinese: 低成本，容易拆解，在生命週期結束零件可重新利用。

sentences.english: All Stainless Steel lid, tank, shell, wetted parts and fittings.
sentences.chinese: 全不鏽鋼蓋，罐，貝殼，溼零件及配件。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a tool for measuring internal thread depth of mechanical parts.
sentences.chinese: 本實用新型涉及機械零件的內螺紋深度測量工具。

sentences.english: The chuck, in a sealed construction, may work for long life with wear-resistant parts.
sentences.chinese: 卡盤結構封閉式，零件耐磨損，使用壽命長。
這些零件完好地焊在一起了。

sentences.english: A semi-intelligent process ing drawing generation system for3dimensional parts is introduced.

sentences.english: Blue Point technology primarily engaged in the design of mechanical parts and processing.

sentences.english: Calculate the product of each "parts" the cost of material price.
sentences.chinese: 就計算出產品中各個“零件”的成本材料價格。

sentences.english: The warranty covers all power-train components.
